data.lyric:
[ti:Same Thing (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby]
[al:My Turn (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Same Thing - Lil Baby
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Dominique Jones/Brytavious Lekeith Chambers
[00:00.22]Composed by：Dominique Jones/Brytavious Lekeith Chambers
[00:00.34]Lil Juice：
[00:00.46]Tay Keith f**k these n***as up
[00:10.53]I been type of guy she likes since middle school
[00:12.67]Never thought that I'd get famous always know that I'd be cool
[00:15.31]Could've been f**ked on shawty I just didn't wanna be rude
[00:18.24]Eliantte diamonds I want the finest for your jewels
[00:20.59]Am I hittin' them be slidin' up with cameras on my crew
[00:23.36]Ain't doin' too bad I'm somebody you can Google me
[00:26.08]I ain't never worried 'bout what they say that they gon' to do me
[00:28.70]I was puttin' overtime I'm doin' numbers like it's two of me
[00:31.61]That was back then time change this a newer me
[00:34.43]Money conversations at the table I speak fluently
[00:36.84]Stay away from bad vibes I can't see no n***a doing me
[00:39.38]Still give her couple thousand even though she would of did it free
[00:42.02]They don't treat me like no rapper 'cause my vibe like I'm in the street
[00:44.78]I'm one of the top five it ain't too many guys as real as me
[00:47.41]I barely get sleep I'm tryna make sure everybody eats
[00:50.01]Took a trip to overseas I'm buyin' drip in other currencies
[00:52.61]I'm on fire right now it ain't somethin' that there's currently
[00:55.32]And a b***h told a lie if she told you she was curvin' me
[00:57.95]And we all big dawgs ain't gon' let my people work for me
[01:00.93]911 we got a problem it's an emergency yeah
[01:03.78]I heard that crime pays
[01:04.79]Uh
[01:05.18]They think we thugs 'cause we got ice I'm going plain Jane
[01:07.77]No matter what at least a quarter for my main thing
[01:10.34]Showed up on Forbes I can't complain I'm tryna maintain
[01:13.06]Hop off a plane pick up a check then do the same thing
[01:15.04]I heard that crime pays
[01:15.83]They think we thugs 'cause we got ice I'm going plain Jane
[01:18.44]No matter what at least a quarter for my main thing
[01:21.02]Showed up on Forbes I can't complain I'm tryna maintain
[01:23.71]Hop off a plane pick up a check then do the same things
[01:26.93]Lately I've been diggin' your vibe
[01:29.39]I can tell by the look in your eyes
[01:31.81]That you need to get some s**t off your mind
[01:33.98]I give you my time give you jets in the sky
[01:36.61]Have you runnin' runnin' laps for me
[01:38.54]I perform when I'm done you should clap for me
[01:41.46]You got problems on your head you can chat with me
[01:43.88]Have you running around the globe chasing racks with me
[01:46.32]M's in plastic sometimes I'm sarcastic
[01:48.60]I just like to hear laughter tryin' to ease all this pain
[01:51.57]Took off fast I know they hate how I passed them
[01:53.84]Don't gotta be in the grave they throwing dirt on your name yeah
[01:57.23]I heard that crime pays uh
[01:58.44]They think we thugs 'cause we got ice I'm going plain Jane
[02:01.08]No matter what at least a quarter for my main thing
[02:03.62]Showed up on Forbes I can't complain I'm tryna maintain
[02:06.30]Hop off a plane pick up a check then do the same thing
[02:08.29]I heard that crime pays
[02:09.12]They think we thugs 'cause we got ice I'm going plain Jane
[02:11.77]No matter what at least a quarter for my main thing
[02:14.25]Showed up on Forbes I can't complain I'm tryna maintain
[02:16.94]Hop off a plane pick up a check then do the same things
data.trans:
[ti:Same Thing (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby]
[al:My Turn (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.46]Tay Keith制作
[00:10.53]从中学开始 我就是她喜欢的那种男人
[00:12.67]没想到我会出名 一直都知道我会很酷
[00:15.31]差点就被女人给害了 我只是不想太粗鲁
[00:18.24]Eliantte设计的钻石 我想要给你最好的珠宝
[00:20.59]那些家伙要是把相机对准我的团队 我恐怕会教训他们
[00:23.36]我混得还不错 算是个名人 你可以去网上搜搜我
[00:26.08]他们说要对我做什么 我根本就不怕
[00:28.70]我没日没夜地拼命 为了挣钱 付出加倍努力
[00:31.61]那是从前的我 时代变了 我也变了
[00:34.43]在谈判桌上谈生意 我说得头头是道
[00:36.84]远离那些烦人精 我看没人能赶得上我
[00:39.38]就算她愿意免费为我服务 我也给了她几千块
[00:42.02]他们不把我当作说唱歌手 因为我看起来就像是混街头的
[00:44.78]我已经名列前五 没有多少人像我这样直爽
[00:47.41]我几乎不怎么睡觉 我想让每个人都有饭吃
[00:50.01]去海外旅行一遭 我用不同的货币买名牌服装
[00:52.61]我现在就很火 而且这不是昙花一现
[00:55.32]如果女人说她拒绝我 那她肯定是在撒谎
[00:57.95]我们都是大人物 不会让我的朋友为我工作
[01:00.93]警察吗 我们遇到点麻烦 情况紧急
[01:03.78]我听说犯罪就要付出代价
[01:04.79]//
[01:05.18]他们觉得我们是暴徒 因为我们有钻石 我要做个平凡人
[01:07.77]不管怎样 至少要给我的正牌女友二十五万
[01:10.34]荣登福布斯富豪榜 我没什么好抱怨的 我只想保持下去
[01:13.06]从飞机上下来 拿出一点钱 然后再去挥霍一番
[01:15.04]我听说犯罪就要付出代价
[01:15.83]他们觉得我们是暴徒 因为我们有钻石 我要做个平凡人
[01:18.44]不管怎样 至少要给我的正牌女友二十五万
[01:21.02]荣登福布斯富豪榜 我没什么好抱怨的 我只想保持下去
[01:23.71]从飞机上下来 拿出一点钱 然后再去挥霍一番
[01:26.93]最近我在琢磨你的心情
[01:29.39]我从你的眼神就能看出来
[01:31.81]你需要忘记一些不开心的事
[01:33.98]我把时间都给你 让你坐飞机上天去
[01:36.61]让你围着我的身边转
[01:38.54]我表演结束后 你应该为我鼓掌
[01:41.46]你心里有什么烦恼 都可以跟我讲
[01:43.88]让你跟我一起 环游世界 挣钱
[01:46.32]卡里存了几百万 有时候我会很刻薄
[01:48.60]我喜欢听笑声 想要缓解痛苦
[01:51.57]飞黄腾达 我知道 我超越了他们 他们就恨我
[01:53.84]我还没有入土呢 他们就开始说我坏话了
[01:57.23]我听说犯罪就要付出代价
[01:58.44]他们觉得我们是暴徒 因为我们有钻石 我要做个平凡人
[02:01.08]不管怎样 至少要给我的正牌女友二十五万
[02:03.62]荣登福布斯富豪榜 我没什么好抱怨的 我只想保持下去
[02:06.30]从飞机上下来 拿出一点钱 然后再去挥霍一番
[02:08.29]我听说犯罪就要付出代价
[02:09.12]他们觉得我们是暴徒 因为我们有钻石 我要做个平凡人
[02:11.77]不管怎样 至少要给我的正牌女友二十五万
[02:14.25]荣登福布斯富豪榜 我没什么好抱怨的 我只想保持下去
[02:16.94]从飞机上下来 拿出一点钱 然后再去挥霍一番
